>Yeah, we didn't actually create a new tile type, just replaced some
of the grass graphics with newer ones. Smoother would process them the
same since it just looks at the grid tile id number.

*smiles* You're going to have to create new tile types sooner or
later.  As I recall, there's only **let's see*** 3-4 places to change
in order to add new map tiles.

pixdefs.h
radar.cpp
scen.cpp
loader.cpp
level.cpp
smooth.cpp (is this really used by anything other than the scenario
editor?)

* * *

Can you change this one line in loader.cpp from 

fire_frequency[PIX(ORDER_WEAPON, FAMILY_BLOB)] = 2;
to
fire_frequency[PIX(ORDER_WEAPON, FAMILY_BLOB)] = 0;

This is the fire frequency of a slime, making it incredibly slow to
fire.  Either 1 or 0 would be a better value than 2.
